caption.p: IC 50 values of tyrosinase inhibition (A) and IC 50 values of elastase inhibition (B) obtained for the most active extracts. Different letters within the same assay indicate significant differences in ANOVA test ( p < 0.05). Results are expressed ad means ± SD of three independent experiments. COF: Ceterach officinarum DC.; CSI: Camellia sinensis Kuntze; CZE: Cinnamomum zeylanicum Nees; GBI: Ginkgo biloba L.; GGL: Glycyrrhiza glabra L.; RNI: Ribes nigrum L.; ROF: Rheum officinale Baill.; RRO: Rhodiola rosea L.; SOF: Salvia officinalis L.; TPL: Tilia platyphyllos Scop.; VVI: Vitis vinifera L.
